name: RELX Group
goal:
RELX Group (formerly known as Reed Elsevier) is a world leading provider of professional information solutions in the Science, Medical, Risk, Legal & Business sectors. It combines content and data with analytics and technology to create innovative services and outstanding products.
RELX Group's heritage stretches back to the late nineteenth century and to the pioneering work of two industrialists, one English and one Dutch. The two companies merged in 1993.
Our brands include Elsevier, LexisNexis and Reed Exhibitions.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Education, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation
euInitiatives:
copyright framework - InfoSoc Directive
research - Science 2.0, Horizon 2020
data - General Data Protection Regulation, open data, research data
smart farming
